jmap_set_keywords.description:
Set email flags (read, flagged, etc). Add or remove keywords.

    Keywords: $seen (read), $flagged (starred), $answered, $draft.
    Use add_keywords to mark read, remove_keywords to mark unread.

    Args:
        params: JmapSetKeywordsInput containing:
            - email_ids: List of email IDs to update (required)
            - add_keywords: Keywords to add (e.g., ['$seen', '$flagged'])
            - remove_keywords: Keywords to remove (e.g., ['$seen'])
            - account: Email account (optional)

    Returns:
        Confirmation of updated emails.
